name: Ishan Jain
description: The best thing about my career is how it started, most people would be mad if I shared.

name: Oratilwe Modise
description: I don't know what I'm doing, but I've been told that I'm quite good at it.

name: Jenine Wallace
description: I trust my work to a point where I have my whole life backed up  in the cloud.

name: Makhoszana Xaba
description: I do this for the excitement my grandmother has on her face when she uses technology that keeps us in touch with her.

name: Zola Mavuso
description: I am here for the money, travelling and building a clone of myself.
